channel.title: Aliases for the cli commands
channel.description:
Every time I use the core I have some problems remembering some commands. I think we should rename some commands or at least add aliases for them.
- service delete (remove, rm) - service list (ls) - service execute (exec) - service detail (get)
That's the one I'm usually confused with (in order of use ish)

item.title: Aliases for the cli commands
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Aliases implemented in the CLI js https://github.com/mesg-foundation/cli

Read full topic

item.title: Aliases for the cli commands
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Rename is not necessary if we do aliases.
Still having remove instead of delete and get instead of detail would be great.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliases for the cli commands

item.description:
I’m ok for the aliases.

What command you would like to rename??

item.title: Aliases for the cli commands
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Every time I use the core I have some problems remembering some commands.
I think we should rename some commands or at least add aliases for them.

  • service delete (remove, rm)
  • service list (ls)
  • service execute (exec)
  • service detail (get)

That’s the one I’m usually confused with (in order of use ish)

Read full topic
